name: Castle Quest (Antoine Nisoli, Pierre Morreel, Martin Calujek)
name_original: Castle Quest (Antoine Nisoli, Pierre Morreel, Martin Calujek)
description:
Castle Quest is a little puzzle-rpg game, inspired by the Castle Crashers universe. The gameplay is also inspired by the Puzzle Quest franchise, as the battle system is using some match-3 mechanics. This game is made for android, so you can download the .apk and play it on your phone, or in the HTML player right here. Enjoy ! 

This game has been made by 5 students :

  • Antoine Nisoli : Programmer
  • Martin Calujek : Game Art
  • Pierre Moreel : Game Art, Game Design
  • Charles Rouvres : Game Art, Game Design
  • Louis Rémy : Game Art
